context_bundle.summary: Tool Hallway extends PhiSHRI with callable MCP tool definitions. Same Matrix hallway architecture - Knowledge Hallway for docs, Tool Hallway for executable schemas with examples and trigger patterns. Enables dynamic tool loading (95% context reduction) instead of stuffing all 119 tools upfront.

onboarding.quick_start: Tool doors use MT_ prefix (MT_EV_SEARCH, MT_GIT_COMMIT). Each door contains: tool_definition (server, name, schema), usage_patterns (triggers, when_to_use), examples (intent + invocation), gotchas, and link to knowledge_door for deep context.
common_patterns: categories: FILE_SEARCH, GIT, SHELL, NETWORK, etc.
